entry.def: sores generated by burning fire poison

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with huo chuang 火瘡 , fire sores. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 , Bai bing zhu zhi yao 綱 目百病主治藥 , Zhu chuang 諸瘡 ; re chuang 熱瘡：枸杞葉塗火赫毒瘡 , “The leaves of gou qi are to be applied externally to sores generated by burning fire poison ”.
